task.title: Viewing information copied from the structure panel
task.shortdesc: CWRC-Writer provides the option of looking at what you have copied in the structure panel before you need to paste it in. This allows you to make sure you have selected exactly what you wanted to work with.

copyright.copyrholder: Use of this public-domain resource is governed by the Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License

context.p: Copying information in CWRC-Writer can at times be a daunting task, but we provide the option to make sure you know exactly what you have copied before you paste it.

prereq.p: Copy a portion of text in CWRC-Writer (see instructions at:)

step.cmd: Click on the small arrow at the bottom of the CWRCWriter window/frame.
step.stepresult: This will bring up the "Validation" and "Selection" Tabs.

taskbody.result: You will be able to see what you have copied, included the tags and text.
